mapper.select: SELECT ec.id,ec.title,ec.price,ec.lesson_num,ec.cover, ecd.description, et.`name` AS teacher_name, es1.title AS subject_level_one, es2.title AS subject_level_two FROM edu_course ec LEFT JOIN edu_course_description ecd ON ec.id=ecd.id LEFT JOIN edu_teacher et ON ec.teacher_id=et.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject es1 ON ec.subject_parent_id=es1.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject es2 ON ec.subject_id=es2.id WHERE ec.id=#{courseId}
